seo_content:
Exclusive Blueberry Funded Trading Offer

Blueberry Funded, based in Australia, was established in April 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering 1 Step and 2 Steps program types. Account sizes range from $25,000 to $100,000. Platforms supported include MT4 and MT5. Tradable instruments include Forex, Commodities and Indices, with leverage options up to 1:100 for majors, exotics, and cryptocurrencies. Blueberry Funded has a 4.5/5 review score based on 510 reviews. checked by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Blueberry Funded Promo Code: 15% OFF Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Blueberry Funded using our exclusive discount code. certified for the current trading season.
